me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.odometrycore

Class ThreeWheelOdometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.robot.AbstractOdometry
      • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.odometrycore.ThreeWheelOdometry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Modifiable<PointXYZ>, Odometry

    public class ThreeWheelOdometry
extends AbstractOdometry
    A generic three wheel odometry implementation. This odometry depends on the OdometryCore core class, a part of the OdometryCore library.
    Since:
    0.0.0
    Author:
    Colin Robertson
    See Also:
    ThreeWheelOdometry.EncoderProfile, ThreeWheelOdometry.ThreeWheelOdometryProfile

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ThreeWheelOdometry.EncoderProfile
      A group of three Suppliers, each of which should supply a number representing an encoder's position/count.
      static class  ThreeWheelOdometry.ThreeWheelOdometryProfile
      A group of parameters used by OdometryCore to calculate the position of a robot over time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThreeWheelOdometry(ThreeWheelOdometry.ThreeWheelOdometryProfile profile, ThreeWheelOdometry.EncoderProfile encoders)
      Create a new ThreeWheelOdometry instance and initialize OdometryCore.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PointXYZ getRawPosition()
      Get the robot's raw position from the odometry system.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreeWheelOdometry

        public ThreeWheelOdometry(ThreeWheelOdometry.ThreeWheelOdometryProfile profile,
                          ThreeWheelOdometry.EncoderProfile encoders)
        Create a new ThreeWheelOdometry instance and initialize OdometryCore.
        Parameters:
        profile - a set of parameters necessary for OdometryCore to properly calculate the robot's position.
        encoders - a group of suppliers, representing physical encoders on the robot.

    • Method Detail

      • getRawPosition

        public PointXYZ getRawPosition()
        Get the robot's raw position from the odometry system.
        Returns:
        the robot's position.
